Package Model

Class MovieSession

  • Object
    • MovieSession
  • public class MovieSession
extends Object
    Represents a movie viewing session in the MOBLIMA Cinema Application
    Since:
    21-10-2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sally Carrera

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private String movieTitle
      Title of movie being screened in the MovieSession
      private movieType_Enum movieType
      Type of movie in the MovieSession (2D, 3D or Blockbuster)
      private Seat[][] sessionSeats
      MovieSession's seat arrangement, represented as a 2D array, depending on the cinema's class
      private LocalDateTime showtime
      MovieSession's show time, in the format of yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm

      • bookSeat

        public ArrayList<Seat> bookSeat​(String id,
                                cinemaClass_Enum cinemaClass)
        Sets a seat as occupied in that MovieSession
        Parameters:
        id - The seat ID that the MovieGoer inputs
        cinemaClass - The cinemaClass of the cinema that the MovieSession is being held in
        Returns:
        true if the booking was successful, otherwise returns false
